definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.chinese: 你能給這句話消除歧義嗎。

sentences.english: Language is always full of eeriness and ambiguity.
sentences.chinese: 語言總是充滿了弔詭和歧義。

sentences.english: Ambiguity from the negative scope is much more in English than Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 英語中因否定範圍不清而導致的歧義遠多勝於漢語。

sentences.english: So explain the ambiguity of this sentence. These sentences.
sentences.chinese: 所以解釋這句話中的歧義，這些句子。

sentences.english: It may be possible to disambiguate by using fully qualified names.
sentences.chinese: 使用完全限定的名稱可能會消除歧義。

sentences.english: The cognition frequency of the single item is often unbalanced in the ambiguity structure.
sentences.chinese: 歧義結構單義項的認知理解頻率往往是不平衡的。

sentences.english: Our minds make meaning by disambiguating the meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 我們的心理通過在無意義中消除歧義獲得意義。

sentences.english: Telephone numbers will not be ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 電話號碼間不存在歧義。

sentences.english: At present the disagreement about the concept and the connotation of Qin culture still exists in academic circles.
sentences.chinese: 目前學術界對於秦文化的概念和內涵仍有歧義。

sentences.english: There are three types of ambiguity. Lexical, so what's wrong with that one?
sentences.chinese: 有三種歧義，詞彙的，那麼這一種問題在哪呢？

sentences.english: As the first philosophical proposition, "Water is arche" has been very ambiguous .
sentences.chinese: “水是原則”作爲第一個哲學命題卻至今歧義很多。

sentences.english: Can anyone tell me the ambiguity that is here?
sentences.chinese: 誰能告訴我這兒的歧義在哪嗎？

sentences.english: Ambiguities are be produced inevitably when chinese is segmented and tagged.
sentences.chinese: 對漢語進行切分和標註，不可避免要產生歧義。

definition: to take one's seat according to the ticket number/(fig.) to put (things or people) in their right place/to take a general comment as a personal attack
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
faulty wording/mispronunciation due to a speech defect
to act in a way that defeats one's purpose (idiom)
